app_description: Battery Manager is your go-to solution for efficient battery management on your KaiOS featurephone. Keep track of vital battery stats like discharge and charge times, temperature, and real-time level changes. Set personalized alerts for specific battery levels, both high and low, to ensure you never run out of power when you need it most. Download Battery Manager now and take charge of your device's battery life for a worry-free mobile experience.
charge_time_explanation: Estimated time to fully charge the battery.
currentTemperature: ° is the current temperature of the phone.
discharge_time_explanation: Estimated time until the battery is fully depleted.
max_charge_explanation: Alarm activates when the battery exceeds this level.
min_charge_explanation: Alarm activates when the battery drops below this level.
temperature_explanation: Estimated temperature of the battery in Celsius.
usb_attached_but_not_charging: Cable is attached but doesn't charge.
html:
About

Battery Manager v1.5.0

Battery insights and custom alerts.

What does the app do?

Battery Manager is your go-to solution for efficient battery management on your KaiOS featurephone. Keep track of vital battery stats like discharge and charge times, temperature, and real-time level changes. Set personalized alerts for specific battery levels, both high and low, to ensure you never run out of power when you need it most. Download Battery Manager now and take charge of your device's battery life for a worry-free mobile experience.


Keystrokes:

1 - Volume down

3 - Volume up

0 - Toggle Light mode

* - Toggle silent alarm (only notification)

# - Show this page
